subject: Football
Executive Compensation
lead_paragraph: Goodell, the commissioner of the N.F.L., made about 20 percent less than he did the previous year, but he was still one of the highest-paid chief executives in America.
snippet: Goodell, the commissioner of the N.F.L., made about 20 percent less than he did the previous year, but he was still one of the highest-paid chief executives in America.
